OFFICIAL RECORD 
UNCLASSIFIED 
FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION 
Intake 
Date: 38/11/2020 
Case ID #: 50D-NY-3027571 (U) EPSTEIN, JEFFREY; CHILD SEX 
TRAFFICKING 
Drafted By: 
Date/Time Received: 08/10/2020 11:20 PM EDT 
Details: 
On 08/10/2020, at 08/10/2020 p.m. Eastern Time, an anonymous female 
caller (Anonymous), cellular telephone 
number-, 
called the 
FBI National Threat Operations Center (NTOC) Unit to report information 
related to Jeffrey Epstein. 
Anonymous provided the following information: 
Anonymous reported her father, ,  residing in 
Tarpon Springs, FL, an attorney, was a former recruiter for Epstein. 
Anonymous stated she and her five siblings were "sold" throughout their 
entire childhood and Anonymous stated she met Epstein when she was four 
years old, around the time Ghislaine was around. Anonymous was given 
mental health problems while growing up in order to make her appear less 
credible. Anonymous stated her father forced men to have sex with her 
beginning at the age of four or five. Anonymous reported she is now 28-
years old and she cannot do it anymore. 
While growing up, assigned all of the siblings with "pimps." 
Anonymous stated her "pimp" was only a year older and they were expected 
to marry one another. Anonymous noted she is still with her "pimp" and 
they have a four year old child together. is currently 
attempting to get full custody of Anonymous' child, but Anonymous fears 
he will be trafficked as well. Anonymous' child has already made 
reference to "I don't want grandpa to hurt my butt" and "I don't want 
monsters to come in my room." 
UNCLASSIFIED 
EFTA00020479

UNCLASSIFIED 
Re: 50D-NY-3027571, 08/11/2020 
Anonymous reported her siblings would never 
come forward with the 
information and would never 
bring it up. Anonymous stated she is still 
"under the thumb" of an unknown man that sells her, and 
Anonymous 
receives no money for it. Anonymous often blacked-out as a child and 
stated some of her memories are 
unclear. 
Anonymous is potentially willing to provide additional information in 
person. Anonymous noted she was the one to take the photograph of Prince 
Andrew 
and 
in 2001. Anonymous formally 
went by the name
